sentence.Network_en: A touch whimsically, Nim speculated on whether he was falling in love.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼姆突然异想天开地想到他是否正陷入情网.

sentence.Network_en: Raising himself on an elbow, Nim said, " I wouldn't trust you ".
sentence.Network_cn: 尼姆用一只胳臂肘支撑身子, 说: “ 我才不相信你哩. ”

sentence.Network_en: Nim sensed, among his audience, rapt and immediate interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼姆意识到听众中顿时产生一种着了迷似的兴趣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: apparently from archaic nim 'to take' or from German nimm! 'take!', imperative of nehmen

encyclopedia.content: 经济学中的释义 经济学中的解释 NIM 英文全称：The net interest margin（净利息边际），在中国的银行业中，又叫做息差。用于衡量一个银行存贷盈利能力。 英文定义：NIM:measures the net return on a bank’s earning assets。 算法： NIM=净利息收入/生息资产=（利息收入-利息成本）/（证券借款+净借出款） 附注：证券借款：investment securities 净借出款：net loans and leases 用NIM评测一个银行的存贷利差盈利能力时，不能
